item.title: New Release - 0.5.0
item.description: The main feature of this release is adding the support for Cake version 0.26.0. The project have also now been setup as a example project with pulling/pushing translations to transifex (these are also included in the package).
item.author: AdmiringWorm
item.content:encoded:
0.5.0 Compatibility Release

The main feature of this release is adding the support for Cake version 0.26.0. The project have also now been setup as a example project with pulling/pushing translations to transifex (these are also included in the package).

EDIT: It turns out this support, was only for partial support for Cake version 0.26.0. It is only supported when targeting .NET Core 2.0, and not when targeting the full .NET Framework.

Release notes

As part of this release we had 22 commits which resulted in 5 issues being closed.

Feature

  • #22 Support Cake.Core 0.26

Improvement

  • #20 Change all hard coded strings to translatable strings

Documentation

  • #23 Updated documentation to the correct .NET Core and .NET Framework versions
  • #19 Mention which cake versions are supported in wyam documentation.
  • #18 Documentation in Readme.md is outdated

Where to get it

You can download this release from nuget

item.title: New Release - 0.5.0
item.description: Due to misunderstanding of the requirements, the previously released version only added partial support for Cake version 0.26.0. This release fixes that, but unfortunately includes breaking changes due to this. It was also decided to remove all support for cake versions released prior to version 0.26.0.
item.author: AdmiringWorm
item.content:encoded:
0.6.0 The breaking change release

Due to misunderstanding of the requirements, the previously released version only added partial support for Cake version 0.26.0. This release fixes that, but unfortunately includes breaking changes due to this. It was also decided to remove all support for cake versions released prior to version 0.26.0.

Release notes

As part of this release we had 9 commits which resulted in 2 issues being closed.

Breaking Changes

  • #25 Add full support for Cake version 0.26.0 and above
  • #24 Drop support for versions of Cake previous to 0.26.0

Where to get it

You can download this release from nuget

item.title: New Release - 0.4.0
item.description: This blog post is a little belated, but here it is. This release is just a minor compatibility release to make Cake.Transifex compatible with Cake above version 0.22, while maintaining compatibility with previous releases.
item.author: AdmiringWorm
item.content:encoded:
0.4.0 Compatibility Release

This blog post is a little belated, but here it is. This release is just a minor compatibility release to make Cake.Transifex compatible with Cake above version 0.22, while maintaining compatibility with previous releases.

Release Notes

As part of this release we had 9 commits which resulted in 2 issues being closed.

Feature

  • #16 Update Cake.Core dependency to version 0.22.0

Where to get it

You can download this release from nuget

item.title: New Release - 0.3.0
item.description: As part of this release we had 58 commits which resulted in 8 issues being closed.
item.author: AdmiringWorm
item.content:encoded:
0.3.0 Release

As part of this release we had 58 commits which resulted in 8 issues being closed.

Feature

  • #7 Support the 'Init' command

Improvements

  • #10 Build against Cake.Core version 16.2
  • #9 Start using Cake.Recipe for windows builds
  • #6 Use the Cake Contrib Icon

Documentation

  • #13 Update Readme to be similiar to other Cake addins
  • #12 Configure gitreleasemanager to add package nuget url on releases
  • #11 Start using wyam to document the addin

Where to get it

You can download this release from nuget

item.title: New Release - 0.2.0
item.description: As part of this release we had 1 issue closed.
item.author: AdmiringWorm
item.content:encoded:
0.2.0 Release

As part of this release we had 1 issue closed.

Enhancement

  • #4 Support additional modes when pulling translations

item.title: New Release - 0.1.0
item.description: I'm happy to anounce the first public release of the Cake.Transifex library.
item.author: AdmiringWorm
item.content:encoded:
0.1.0 Release

I'm happy to anounce the first public release of the Cake.Transifex library.

In this release, the following issue was resolved:

Feature

  • #1 Initial Release
